title: Did President Obama release 122 prisoners from Guantánamo?
subtitle: Although 122 detainees transferred from Guantánamo Bay were later found to have been involved in terrorist activities, 113 of these detainees were released under the administration of President George W. Bush.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: 122 detainees released from detention at Guantánamo Bay, led by President Obama, have returned to terrorist activities.
